user.title: Define your SolaX Power Inverter modbus-connection

data.host: The ip-address of your SolaX Power Inverter modbus device; for RS485, the name of the serial port e.g. /dev/ttyUSB0
data.name: The prefix to be used for your SolaX Power Inverter sensors
data.port: The TCP port on which to connect to the SolaX Power Inverter; for RS485, the name of the serial port e.g. /dev/ttyUSB0
data.scan_interval: The polling frequency of the modbus registers in seconds
